location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to R Morgan, Acting Assistant to the Superintendent

mods.abstract: Letter in response to a request for a statement of William Bruce's services from his arrival in India up to the present period. Includes a statement of Bruce's employment, from his arrival in India in 1795, to his current position as Resident at Bushire.
